name: Hive Mind (itch) (Avat4r)
description:
Created by Madeline Thornley with assets from Michigan State University. 

This is a first-person shooter set on a desolate planet filled with bugs willing to lay die their lives for their Queen of the Hive. You must battle your way through hordes of enemies across an arid landscape in fast-paced fashion. 

Proposed Modifications: 

Additional Weapons (1-2)

Addition of blood and gore effects 

Changing of the theme of the environment with new textures and new layouts 

Addition of 2 Levels
